name: #TouhouDanmakufu
description:
Designates the file as a Touhou Danmakufu script and determines the type.

Possible types are `Single`, `Plural`, `Stage` and `Package`.

name: #ScriptVersion
description:
Sets the script version.

ph3 requires `3` as version.

name: #ID
description:
Sets the ID of the script.

If omitted, the file name becomes the ID.

Used internally to distinguish between scripts.

name: #Title
description:
Sets the title of the script.

Displayed in the main menu.

Use `[r]` for line breaks.

name: #Text
description:
Sets the description of the script.

Displayed in the main menu.

Use `[r]` for line breaks.

name: #Image
description:
Sets the image displayed in the menu when highlighting the script.

Use `640x480` images.

name: #System
description:
Sets the path to the system script.

If omitted, the default system script under `/script/default_system/Default_System.txt` will be used.

name: #Background
description:
Sets the path to the background script.

If omitted, the background is black.

name: #BGM
description:
Sets the path to an audio file that plays in the background.

You can also manually load and play audio files in your script.

name: #Player
description:
Sets the players that can be used with the script.

If omitted, all players can be used.

You can specify multiple players by passing multiple parameters, e.g., `#Player["./player/player1/player1.txt", "./player/player2/player2.txt"]`.

name: #ReplayName
description:
Sets a custom name for replays.

Must be 8 characters or less.

name: #UserShotData
description: Designates that the file contains shot data.

name: #UserItemData
description: Designates that the file contains item data.
